basicInfo.desc: This Task provides the save a document.

parameter.name: msgID
parameter.desc: The Message ID of a previously executed RWBean.

parameter.name: folderID
parameter.desc: The folder where the document is to be saved

parameter.name: saveAsFlags
parameter.desc: The save as flag. Set it to 1 if you want to overwrite the existing object. See EnumDSSXMLDocSaveAsFlags for details
